description: This is Netconf Edit Configuration Component API

template-name.description: Template name used by the Components during processing

rpc-message.description: If the message is Neconf RPC message,It should be true or false.

wait.description: Delay time in sec before performing edit-config action.

unlock.description: If unLock command has to send before Edit Configuration.

commit.description: Issue commit command to the device after performing edit-config action.

content.description: Static messgae content, If this is not set, need to have Requirement relationship to Artifact contents.

lock.description: Issue lock command to the device before performing edit-config action.

post-restart-wait.description: If Restart command should be issued before the Edit Operation, Provide the time to wait after restart. 0 meanno restart required or wait time in sec ex : 3000 for 5

pre-restart-wait.description: If Restart command should be issued after the Edit Operation, Provide the time to wait after restart. 0 meanno restart required or wait time in sec ex : 3000 for 5

status.description: Status of the Component Execution ( success or failure )
